name: Communication of Privacy Policies and Procedures
description: Provide evidence that privacy policies and procedures are adequately communicated to all relevant parties, including employees, contractors, and third parties who have access to personal data.
requirements: Documentation of privacy policy communication methods
Training records showing privacy policy awareness
Evidence of privacy policy accessibility to all relevant parties
Acknowledgment receipts or confirmations from staff and contractors
Regular updates and re-communication of policy changes
compliance_requirements: SOC 2 Type II CC1.1 - Control Environment
SOC 2 Type II CC1.2 - Communication and Information
acceptance_criteria: Privacy policies are documented and approved
Communication methods are documented and implemented
All new hires receive privacy policy training within 30 days
Policy updates are communicated within 30 days of changes
